content.title: Loan Based Schemes For Safai Karamchari - General Term Loan (GTL)
content.department: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
content.beneficiary: Safai Karamcharis, Manual Scavengers, and their dependents aged 18 years and above
content.details: A general term loan scheme by the Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment for Safai Karamchari, Manual Scavengers, and their dependents aged 18 years and above. Term loan of up to 90% of the unit cost with a maximum unit cost of Rs.15.00 lacs at an interest rate of 6%, for any viable income generating schemes including sanitation-related activities.
benefits: Up to 90% of the unit cost with a maximum unit cost of Rs.15.00 lacs at an interest rate of 6%
Repayment period of up to 10 years after an implementation period of 4 months and a moratorium of 6 months
Loans extended through State Channelising Agencies (SCA), Regional Rural Banks (RRBs), and Nationalised Banks
eligibility: Safai Karamcharis (including Wastepickers), identified Manual Scavengers and their dependents
Registered co-operative societies of the target group
Legally constituted association/firm promoted by the target group
Persons with a certificate from local authorities as specified
content.application_process: Offline and Online. Interested eligible persons shall contact the nearest Channeling Agency.

faqs.question: What is moratorium period?
faqs.answer: A moratorium period refers to a particular period of a loan tenure during which the borrower does not have to repay anything.

faqs.question: Does the scheme provide loans to all Unorganized Workers persons?
faqs.answer: No, the scheme provides loans only to Safai Karamchari, Manual Scavengers and their dependants.

faqs.question: How does the scheme provide assistance?
faqs.answer: Under this scheme, term loans are extended through State Channelising Agencies (SCA), Regional Rural Banks(RRBs) and Nationalised Banks to the target group.

faqs.question: Is there any income limit for the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, there is no such limit mentioned in the guidelines.

faqs.question: With what type of Projects can I avail this schemes?
faqs.answer: Any viable and income generating schemes are financed by NSKFDC to Safai Karamcharis, Scavengers and their dependents.
